title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as “ollama”.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as “ollama”.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with Docker one-liner deployment.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI tool for chatting, managing models, and pulling models from the Ollama registry.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and chat into the editor.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama with Maven Central artifact “ollama4j” supporting chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that plugs into a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any Discord server via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node enabling no-code workflows to call Ollama models for chat, completion, and embeddings.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack bot using Socket-Mode to stream Ollama responses in Slack threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Official Kotlin multiplatform client for Ollama (Maven: ai.ollama:ollama-kotlin).

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama (pkg.go.dev/ollama/ollama) with streaming and embeddings support.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles and tips for running specialized models in Ollama.
